update.description:
This pull request adds support for the [DART physics engine](http://dartsim.github.io/). Thanks to @jlee02 @karenliu @\_jrivero_ and Tobias Kunz for their work to support this.

In order to install dart, please add the libccd-debs, fcl-debs, and dartsim PPA's to your apt sources and install libdart-core3-dev:
~~~
sudo apt-add repository ppa:libccd-debs
sudo apt-add repository ppa:fcl-debs
sudo apt-add repository ppa:dartsim
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install libdart-core3-dev
~~~
These debs are available for precise, quantal, and raring. There is a problem with saucy that is being worked on.

This pull request targets gazebo_2.1, and I expect ABI to be compatible. To make sure, I just started an [ABI checker](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/34/)) on Jenkins.

There are a number of places where DART doesn't pass integration tests. In these cases, issues have been created, and conditionals added to the test files. Search the issue tracker for component [physics::DARTPhysics](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues?component=physics::DARTPhysics) to see the full list.

I have not personally reviewed all the code in the gazebo/physics/dart subfolder, but I have tried to make sure the build is clean (no warnings, code_check errors, or test failures).
update.title: DART physics engine support

update.title: DART physics engine support

content.raw:
for me, libccd came from https://launchpad.net/~libccd-debs/+archive/ppa/+packages
and libfcl came from https://launchpad.net/~fcl-debs/+archive/ppa/+packages
content.html: for me, libccd came from https://launchpad.net/~libccd-debs/+archive/ppa/+packages and libfcl came from https://launchpad.net/~fcl-debs/+archive/ppa/+packages

content.raw: There are a few inconsistent brief markups starting here.
content.html: There are a few inconsistent brief markups starting here.

content.raw: Convert all the #ifndef to _GAZEBO_<CLASS>_HH_. The extra _GAZEBO_ will help prevent duplicate symbols.
content.html: Convert all the #ifndef to GAZEBO<CLASS>HH. The extra GAZEBO will help prevent duplicate symbols.

content.raw: All these new files should have only 2013 in the copyright.
content.html: All these new files should have only 2013 in the copyright.

content.raw:
Responding to your points:

* I didn't see libccd or fcl in the [dartsim PPA](https://launchpad.net/~dartsim/+archive/ppa/+packages), so I think we still need to add those. He appears to be hosting the non-core dependencies (urdfdom, console_bridge, assimp3 for precise, tinyxml2 for precise, flann 1.8).

* Sure, lets add the dartsim pap to the ABI checker, and possibly a separate Jenkins job for dart testing.
content.html:
Responding to your points:

  • I didn't see libccd or fcl in the dartsim PPA, so I think we still need to add those. He appears to be hosting the non-core dependencies (urdfdom, console_bridge, assimp3 for precise, tinyxml2 for precise, flann 1.8).

  • Sure, lets add the dartsim pap to the ABI checker, and possibly a separate Jenkins job for dart testing.

content.raw:
A couple of quick points:

* I think that Tobias is already [hosting all dependencies inside the dartsim PPA](https://launchpad.net/~dartsim/+archive/ppa/+packages) so it will be the only one required. 
* Respect to the jenkins ABI checker, Should we use inside jenkins the dartsim ppa to get dart into the building process, right? I can take care of that.

Thanks for the work Steve, awesome.
content.html:
A couple of quick points:

  • I think that Tobias is already hosting all dependencies inside the dartsim PPA so it will be the only one required.
  • Respect to the jenkins ABI checker, Should we use inside jenkins the dartsim ppa to get dart into the building process, right? I can take care of that.

Thanks for the work Steve, awesome.

update.description:
This pull request adds support for the [DART physics engine](http://dartsim.github.io/). Thanks to @jlee02 @karenliu @\_jrivero_ and Tobias Kunz for their work to support this.

In order to install dart, please add the libccd-debs, fcl-debs, and dartsim PPA's to your apt sources and install libdart-core3-dev:
~~~
sudo apt-add repository ppa:libccd-debs
sudo apt-add repository ppa:fcl-debs
sudo apt-add repository ppa:dartsim
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install libdart-core3-dev
~~~
These debs are available for precise, quantal, and raring. There is a problem with saucy that is being worked on.

This pull request targets gazebo_2.1, and I expect ABI to be compatible. To make sure, I just started an [ABI checker](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/34/)) on Jenkins.

There are a number of places where DART doesn't pass integration tests. In these cases, issues have been created, and conditionals added to the test files. Search the issue tracker for component [physics::DARTPhysics](#!/osrf/gazebo/issues?component=physics::DARTPhysics) to see the full list.

I have not personally reviewed all the code in the gazebo/physics/dart subfolder, but I have tried to make sure the build is clean (no warnings, code_check errors, or test failures).
update.title: DART physics engine support
